name: Facebook - Fade/Hover Animations and Highlights
description:
IF you are also aware of my other Facebook userstyle called "Facebook - Perfection" (http://userstyles.org/styles/46326/facebook-perfection), this userstyle is now INCORPORATED INTO PERFECTION. You do not need to download this.

Adds some fade effects to the Facebook interface. 

Compatible with pretty much any CSS3 capable browser - including Firefox, Google Chrome & Opera!
additional_info:
Uses the -moz-transition property.
Requires CSS3-compatible browser to work!!!  Use the latest browser!

Changelog:
2.0 - FINAL RELEASE. Shorter transition period to mitigate "slide" transition illusion.
1.2 - Solved top bar animation style problem.  "Blue hover rectangle" now fades in this location.  Chat bar hover rectangles yet to be fixed.  Now also compatible with more than just Firefox.
1.0 - Initial release
